alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Wakulla, northern Jefferson, southeastern Leon, northwestern Madison, southern Cook, south central Berrien, northwestern Lowndes, southeastern Thomas and Brooks Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Adel to 8 miles southeast of Boston to 7 miles south of Tallahassee Community College. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. At 445 PM EDT, dime sized hail was reported in southern Thomas County. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Quitman, Adel, Valdosta, Hahira, Boston, Ray City, Doak Campbell Stadium, Morven, Cecil, Alma, Lake Bradford, Cody, Wakulla Springs and Greggs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
